name: Query Rapid ILS Print Serials
query: SELECT DISTINCT identifiers.identifier AS issn, instances.title AS title, items.effective_location_name AS location, items.effective_call_number AS call_number, items.enumeration AS enum, items.chronology AS chron FROM folio_derived.instance_identifiers identifiers INNER JOIN folio_derived.instance_ext instances ON identifiers.instance_id = instances.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_inventory.holdings_record__t__ holdings ON instances.instance_id = holdings.instance_id INNER JOIN folio_derived.item_ext items ON holdings.id = items.holdings_record_id WHERE identifiers.identifier_type_name = 'ISSN' AND instances.mode_of_issuance_name = 'serial' AND instances.type_name = 'text' AND instances.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND holdings.discovery_suppress = 'f' AND items.material_type_name = 'unmediated -- volume' AND items.effective_location_name IN ('Evans stk') AND identifiers.identifier = '0000-0302' AND instances.title like '%The Mystery & detection annual.%' ORDER BY issn, title, location, call_number, enum, chron
